title: Opening | open
description:
Welcome to Toki Pona Day!
o kama pona tawa suno pi toki pona!

title: A reading of Waso Mun | toki uta pi sitelen Waso Mun
description:
An illustrated poem telling the story of a young ruru owl and their search for friendship. I made this last year, with a focus on NZ flora and fauna :)
sitelen ni li toki e alasa olin pi waso mun Ruru. ni li pali mi tan sike ma pini; ona li jo e kasi mute e soweli mute tan ma mi Awatejalowa (ma Nusilan :)

title: Let's make string dolls! | mi ale o pali e jan linja!
description:
Learn how to make string dolls with this Toki Pona craft tutorial! Perfect for gifts, magic and decor, these little fellas only need string and scissors to come to life. A tapestry needle or small stick will also come in handy.
o kama sona e nasin pali pi jan linja kepeken sitelen tawa ni! jan musi ni li pona tawa ijo mute. sina ken pana e ona tawa jan ante anu insa tomo. ilo pali la sina wile e linja pi kule wile, e ilo kipisi. palisa pi lupa linja suli li ilo pona.

title: pali musi Showcase: ilo Kuko | musi pi tenpo pali musi: ilo Kuko
description:
Interview and showcase with the devs behind the top ranked game from pali musi: "ilo Kuko"
mi en mama pi musi ni li toki li musi: "ilo Kuko". musi ona li nanpa tu lon utala pi pali musi.

title: jan Tanijelun's first Toki Pona song translation | ante toki nanpa wan pi jan Tanijelun tawa kalama musi
description:
I'd like to share my literal first song that I translated in Toki Pona that I have yet to legitimately release. Intro, background story, and commentary included!
ni li ante toki nanpa wan mi lon toki pona tawa kalama musi a. mi o toki e ijo monsi kin lon ante toki ni a!

title: Gartic Phone | musi Gartic Phone
description:
o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.
o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.

title: Paskie poem reading | nasin Paki kepeken toki lili
description:
Reading a series of toki pona poems relating to Paskie (nasin Pakie, Páßke) - an anti-judgment pluralistic philosophy with the power to improve the world
jan 56i li toki e toki lili. toki lili ni li tan nasin Pakie. nasin ni li wile ala weka e sona ante. nasin li wile nasin mute. nasin ni li ken pona e ma

performer: soweli suli Alu pi ko lete
title: lon li lon lon lon lon - Anti-Realism, Subjectivism, and Truth in toki pona | lon li lon lon lon lon - weka pi lon wan en lon jan en lon pona
description:
What is "lon" really? What is "real", "correct", and "true" anyway? Are those "lon"? Can there be an inherent, correct meaning for anything? What is logic, and how do toki ponists reason? Learn about all this and more!
nimi Lon li seme? ante la, lon li seme? sona lon wan li ken ala ken? nasin lon li seme? jan pi toki pona li alasa e lon la, nasin ona li seme? o kama sona e ni e ante a!

title: Sketchful | musi Sketchful
description:
jan wan li sitelen musi. jan ale ante li alasa sona e ni: sitelen li seme? musi a.
jan wan li sitelen musi. jan ale ante li alasa sona e ni: sitelen li seme? musi a.

title: The Zaŋ language - a brief guide | toki Zaŋ (San)
description:
An introduction to the Zaŋ language, where every string of valid syllables is grammatically correct and 4.7 million words are possible
o kama sona lili e toki Zaŋ. toki Zaŋ la ale kalama li pona sona. toki Zaŋ li jo ~4,700,000 (kalama: "mute") nimi

title: Music Medley | tenpo kalama nasa
description:
I'll be showing off a couple of songs I've translated over the past couple months, and one (or two) more that I'm translating for SPTP! (content warning: some swearing)
mi pana e ante toki mi pi kalama musi tan tenpo pini. kin la, mi pana e ante toki sin; ona li pali sin tan suno ni! (o sona e ni: unpa lili li ken lon)

title: Gartic Phone | musi Gartic Phone
description:
o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.
o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.

title: 2025 Writing Contest | utala pi lipu toki musi
Music with jan Usawi | kalama musi pi jan Usawi
description:
Come listen to jan Usawi perform their music and talk about art/other fun things!
o kama kute e jan Usawi! mi pali e kalama musi mi li toki e ijo musi a ^^

title: Cards Against Humanity | musi Cards Against Humanity
description:
o musi e toki kepeken lipu!
o musi e toki kepeken lipu!

title: A Computational Analysis of Language Change in Toki Pona | nasin nimi pi toki pona li ante seme lon tenpo?
description:
I made a tool to learn about the changes in Toki Pona's words over time! I'll be talking about the tools I created, how they work, and what I learned from the data. Afterwards, I'll send out a page where you can look for changes yourself in the data!
mi pali e ilo tawa ni: mi kama sona e ante nimi pi toki pona lon tenpo. mi wile toki e ilo mi e nasin pali e sona sin pi toki pona. mi pini la mi pana e lipu pi ken ni: sina kin li ken lukin e sona lon ilo sina!

title: Sketchful | musi Sketchful
description:
jan wan li sitelen musi. jan ale ante li alasa sona e ni: sitelen li seme? musi a.
jan wan li sitelen musi. jan ale ante li alasa sona e ni: sitelen li seme? musi a.

title: Noise and Bells | kalama musi pi jan Sanpe
description:
Live performance by la janbe (aka jan Sanpe) of music in various conlangs
jan Sanpe li pana e kalama musi pi toki pali mute

title: how a lipu tenpo is made
why toki pona is hard (subject to change) | toki pona li wile e wawa mute (mi ken wile ante e ni)
description:
it's common knowledge that toki pona is the easiest language. or is it? I made a youtube video a recently about how I don't think this is true, but I didn't explain why. THIS video will explain why in detail.
toki pona li wile e wawa seme? lon la, wawa mute. tenpo poka la mi toki e ni, taso mi toki ala e tan. tenpo NI la mi pana e sona e tan.

title: kalama Ojuta | kalama Ojuta
description:
music you definitely haven't heard yet
kalama sin la sina kute ala

title: studio time with kqa
description: recording toki pona stuff

title: pali musi Showcase: 5 | musi pi tenpo pali musi: 5
description:
Interview and showcase with the devs behind the top ranked game from pali musi: 5
mi en mama pi musi ni li toki li musi: "5". musi ona li nanpa tu wan lon utala pi pali musi.

title: Use English, Speak Toki Pona | o kepeken toki Inli. o toki pona.
description:
english is a huge part of the toki pona community, which is a bit funny because... just look at the name! why is that? how can we address that?
toki Inli li suli mute lon kulupu pi toki pona. ni li musi mute tan ni: ni li kulupu pi _toki pona a_. ni li tan seme? nasin seme la mi ken ante e ni?

title: Music with jan Usawi | kalama musi pi jan Usawi
description:
Come listen to jan Usawi perform their music and talk about art/other fun things!
o kama kute e jan Usawi! mi pali e kalama musi mi li toki e ijo musi a ^^

title: jan suli pi ma Apese | jan suli pi ma Apese
description:
jan Alin tells an old folktale from their homeland.
jan Alin li pana e toki musi majuna tan ma mama ona.

title: How's Unicode going? | nasin Juniko la seme li lon?
description:
An update on the effort to encode sitelen pona in Unicode!
mi pana e sona ni: mi alasa pana e sitelen pona tawa nasin Juniko la seme li kama?

title: pali musi Showcase: alasa soweli | musi pi tenpo pali musi: alasa soweli
description:
Interview and showcase with the devs behind the top ranked game from pali musi: "alasa soweli"
mi en mama pi musi ni li toki li musi: "alasa soweli". musi ona li nanpa wan lon utala pi pali musi.

title: kalama musi sin pi toki pona (o tawa musi!) | new toki pona music! (Dance!)
description:
ala Lojewalo is a new musician in the toki pona community, soon to release a toki pona album with collaborations from jan Usawi and jan Sonja. Hear the songs live!
ala Lojewalo li jan kalama sin lon kulupu pi toki pona. tenpo poka la ona li pana e kalama kulupu sin! jan Usawi en jan Sonja li lon kalama kulupu. o kute e kalama tan ala Lojewalo!

title: Cosplay and Trans identity: A toki pona-only discussion of research  | musi len en kon tonsi: toki penpo pi alasa sona
description:
nasa Lipuli provides a discussion of her undergraduate research, and personal experience, with the connection between trans identity formation/performance and the cosplay community
toki musi ni la nasa Lipuli li toki e lipu suli ona pi alasa sona pi tomo sona suli. lipu ni li toki e linluwi pi musi len pi kon tonsi pi pali tonsi.

title: soweli Kapi's story time | tenpo pi sitelen musi
description:
I'll do a reading of the first chapter of Alice in Wonderland translated into Toki Pona by me
mi wile toki e sitelen musi ni tawa sina: jan Alisu lon ma nasa

title: Fossilized Phatics in toki pona | toki pona la toki pilin li awen tan seme
description:
toki! why do we hear so many common toki pona phrases repeated in conversation? how did they get there?
toki a! seme la mi pana mute e toki pilin ni lon toki pona? toki nasin ni li tan seme?

title: Luka Pona Thing | ijo pi luka pona
xkcd 1190: Time | musi xkcd#1190: tenpo
description:
a translation of the sequentially drawn story by Randall Munroe
jan Randall Munroe li pali e toki musi pi sitelen mute la mi pana sin e ona kepeken toki ni

title: Gila Monster cover - toki pona taso | akesi Ila
description:
A toki pona translation and cover of the song Gila Monster by KGatLW, translation and vocals by me
jan Apen li toki pona e kalama Gila Monster pi kulupu KGatLW!

title: "Cant stop singing" (toki pona) | "pini ala e musi toki" (toki pona)
description:
A toki pona translation and cover of the song Cant Stop Singing...
toki pona pi kalama musi "Cant Stop Singing" li ante e nimi li kalama sin...

title: Song translation: mun sike li lon sewi | kalama musi: mun sike li lon sewi
description:
A toki pona translation and cover of the German lullaby "Der Mond ist aufgegangen"
mi ante e kalama musi pona tan toki Tosi tawa toki pona. o kute!

title: Covers by kala Asi | kalama musi pi kala Asi
description:
kala Asi covers songs
kala Asi li kalama e ijo tan jan ante.

title: Finale | pini
description:
Toki Pona Day is drawing to a close... let's end it with a bang!
suno pi toki pona li kama pini... ona o pini pona!
